title: Morgan Freeman Takes Stand Against AI Impersonation of His Iconic Voice
description: Morgan Freeman strongly opposes the use of artificial intelligence to mimic his distinct voice, highlighting ongoing legal efforts to combat unauthorized uses. Having expressed his frustration, Freeman appreciates fan support. As AI techniques advance, other celebrities like Scarlett Johansson are also voicing their concerns.
content: In a bold stand against the misuse of artificial intelligence, Hollywood legend Morgan Freeman is taking vigorous action to protect his iconic voice and image. Speaking candidly with The Guardian, Freeman revealed that his legal team is busily addres... [812 chars]

title: Elon Musk says report on xAI's $15 billion fundraise is 'false'
description: BILLIONAIRE Elon Musk on Thursday said on X the CNBC report of his artificial intelligence (AI) startup xAI raising $15 billion in a series E funding round was “false.”
content:
BILLIONAIRE Elon Musk on Thursday said on X the CNBC report of his artificial intelligence (AI) startup xAI raising $15 billion in a series E funding round was “false.”

title: Apple and OpenAI must face X Corp's lawsuit for now - US judge
description: APPLE and ChatGPT maker OpenAI on Thursday failed to convince a federal judge to dismiss a lawsuit by Elon Musk’s X Corp accusing them of conspiring to monopolize markets for smartphones and generative artificial intelligence (AI) chatbots.
content:

title: QUOTE BOX Walmart names insider Furner as CEO McMillon's successor, Wall Street reacts
description: Walmart on Friday announced that CEO Doug McMillon will retire next year and will be succeeded by insider and company veteran John Furner at a time when retailers navigate new challenges such as artificial intelligence and global tariffs.
content:
Walmart shares were down nearly 2% in early trading, as some analysts noted McMillon's retirement could have come earlier than expected. McMillon has led the world's largest retailer for over a decade.

title: AI's influence on discovery and creativity
description: THE Heidelberg Laureate Forum, a confluence of brilliant minds in mathematics and computer science, recently fostered a captivating discussion on the burgeoning role of artificial intelligence (AI) in research and beyond. While AI’s capabilities are undeniable, the insights of young researchers reveal a nuanced perspective, balancing excitement with caution about its impact on creativity and the very essence of human discovery.

title: Disney Plus Set to Radically Change-And Subscribers Are Furious
description: Disney CEO Bob Iger announced in a conference call the streaming service will soon feature user-generated artificial intelligence content.
content:
Many Disney+ subscribers are fuming after Disney CEO Bob Iger announced in a full-year 2025 earnings conference call that the streaming service will feature user-generated artificial intelligence (AI) content.

title: JPMorgan Sees AI Boom Driving Record $1.8 Trillion Bond Sales in 2026
description: A fresh wave of spending to finance investments in artificial intelligence will help drive 2026 issuance in the US investment-grade market to a record $1.81 trillion next year, according to JPMorgan Chase & Co.
content:

title: William Lively Bridges Fintech and Philanthropy to Empower Minnesota Communities
description: In Minneapolis, William Lively has spent his career using technology to bring more transparency to finance.
